Row.Text: Small Fish Market
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Fish.
City must have an improved source of Fish nearby.
Small Crab Market
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Crab.
City must have an improved source of Crab nearby.
Small Wheat Mill
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Wheat.
City must have an improved source of Wheat nearby.
Small Banana Market

City must have an improved source of Banana nearby.
Small Copper Smelter
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Copper.
City must have an improved source of Copper nearby.
Small Cattle Yard
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Cattle.
Each source of [ICON_RES_COW] Cow worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an improved source of Cow nearby.
Small Sheep Butcher
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Sheep.
Each source of [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an improved source of Sheep nearby.

City must have an improved source of Stone nearby.
Medium Fish Market

City must have a Small Fish Market.
Medium Crab Market

A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Wheat.
Each source of [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Small Wheat Mill.

Huge Fish Market

Huge Crab Market
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of Crab.

Each source of [ICON_RES_CRAB] Crab worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 3 Crab.[NEWLINE]City must have a Large Crab Market.Increases the amount of [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_GOLD] Gold produced by this City.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each successive Monopoly Building provides greater benefits.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 1 Crab Resource.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires Large Crab Market Building.
